titles.move_pivot_center: Select to Move Only the Pivot Center

tooltips.los_clear_at_critical_point: Line of sight clear at critical point (margin {diff}m)
tooltips.export_pdf_disabled: Export the KMZ before generating the PDF report.
tooltips.download_active_repeaters: Downloads only the active repeaters currently visible on the map
tooltips.load_kmz: Imports and loads a KMZ file
tooltips.export_kmz: Downloads the complete project as a KMZ file
tooltips.reset: Clears everything and starts a new project
tooltips.export_pdf_report: Generates a PDF report with the study summary

success.new_session_started: Session started. Ready to load KMZ or edit map.
success.kmz_loaded_select_tower: KMZ imported. Choose an antenna to start the simulation.
success.pacman_pivot_created: Sector pivot with arc "{name}" created successfully.
success.app_reset: Application reset. New session in progress.
success.tower_selected_for_simulation: Tower "{name}" selected. Run the simulation from the panel.
success.location_found: Location found and marked on the map.
success.template_unlocked: Template Brazil V6 90dBm temporarily unlocked for this session.

errors.session_start_fail: Critical failure starting new session. Please reload the page.
errors.invalid_data_or_session: Invalid data or session not started. Reset the application.
errors.no_coverage_to_search: No active coverage area. Activate the main antenna or a repeater.
errors.session_not_started_for_draw: Session not started. Reset before drawing.
errors.session_not_started: Session not started. Load a KMZ or reset the application.
errors.nothing_to_export: No data eligible for export. Run a simulation first.
errors.los_diagnostic_fail: Line of sight diagnostic failed for target {name}.
errors.los_source_must_have_signal: SOURCE: select a target (pivot or irripump) WITH signal.
errors.invalid_coordinate_format: Invalid coordinate format. Use DMS (e.g., 19°26'S 44°29'W) or Decimal (e.g., -19.44 -44.49).
errors.draw_pivot_radius_too_small: Radius too small. Drawing cancelled. Click again to set the center.
errors.template_load_fail: Failed to fetch templates. Check your connection.
errors.load_kmz_first: Import a KMZ file before generating the report.
errors.los_need_one_signal_source: You need to select at least one pivot center with signal to run the line-of-sight analysis.

info.no_towers_found: No antennas found in the KMZ. Add one manually by clicking on the map.
info.los_mode_on: 'Analyze Repeater Location' mode activated. Select an uncovered pivot.
info.target_pivot_selected: Target pivot selected: {name}. Searching for locations...
info.no_promising_sites_found: No promising sites found with the current criteria.
info.draw_pivot_step1: Click to set the pivot's center.
info.draw_pivot_step2: Center set. Click again to set the radius.
info.draw_pivot_still_active: Edit mode still active. Click for a new pivot.
info.analyzing_targets_from_source: Analyzing line of sight for {count} targets from "{source}"...
info.no_uncovered_targets_in_radius: No uncovered targets within a {limit} radius.
info.edit_mode_activated: Edit mode activated: drag pins or right-click to remove.
info.positions_updated_resimulate: Positions updated. Rerun the simulation to see the impact.
info.los_mode_step1_source: PIVOT-TO-PIVOT DIAGNOSTIC: select the SOURCE target (with signal).
info.los_source_selected: SOURCE: {name} selected. Now select the DESTINATION (without signal).
info.los_source_already_selected: SOURCE: {name} is already the source. Select the DESTINATION.
info.los_source_changed: SOURCE changed to: {name}. Select the DESTINATION.
info.los_new_source_prompt: Select a new SOURCE (with signal) or deactivate the mode.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step1: Sector Edit Mode: click to set the center.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step2: Center set. Adjust radius and direction and click to finish.
info.draw_sector_pivot_still_active: Sector Mode still active. Click for a new pivot.
info.draw_pacman_step1: Sector with Arc Edit Mode: click to set the center.
info.draw_pacman_step2: Center set. Click for radius and start angle.
info.draw_pacman_step3: Radius and start angle set. Click for end angle.
info.draw_pacman_still_active: Arc Mode still active. Click for a new pivot.
info.draw_irripump_step1: Add Irripump Mode: click to place.
info.draw_irripump_still_active: Irripump Mode still active. Click for another one.
info.find_repeater_long_process_warning: The search for repeater locations can take a minute or more. Please wait.
info.move_pivot_center_on: Move pivot center mode enabled. The circle will NOT move. Click the button again to disable.
info.move_pivot_center_off: Move pivot center mode disabled. Position has been updated, please re-evaluate coverage.
info.no_active_png_overlays: No active (visible) antenna/repeater coverages to download.

confirm.remove_pivot: Are you sure you want to remove the pivot "{name}" and its associated areas?
confirm.remove_irripump: Are you sure you want to remove the Irripump "{name}"?
confirm.change_los_source: SOURCE is already {sourceName}. Change to {newName}? Diagnostic lines will be removed.

loader_tips.inaccurate_search: The search for repeater locations can sometimes be inaccurate!
loader_tips.try_manual_repeater: Try placing repeaters on nearby pivots before searching with AI.
loader_tips.consider_nearby_locations: Always consider the locations indicated closest to the pivot and in areas where poles can be positioned.
loader_tips.blocked_los_compensation: Locations with blocked line of sight can be compensated by installing poles!
